attributes.action: Limit Council Tax increases to the current rate of inflation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should the government be allowed to increase our annual council tax bill above the the rate of infaltion when our annual pay rise which is less than the rate of inflation does not cover this increase so every year we are expected to find the extra money for less services as the government reduces the grant that they give local Councils each year to fund the services that they provide.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
